title: P06-4007

sentences.text: This paper describes FERRET , an interactive question-answering -LRB- Q/A -RRB- system designed to address the challenges of integrating automatic Q/A applications into real-world environments .

FERRET utilizes a novel approach to Q/A known as predictive questioning which attempts to identify the questions -LRB- and answers -RRB- that users need by analyzing how a user interacts with a system while gathering information related to a particular scenario .

Entity-this_paper.label: This paper
Entity-this_paper.description: The research paper being described, which presents FERRET, an interactive question-answering system designed for real-world environments.

Entity-ferret.label: FERRET
Entity-ferret.description: An interactive question-answering system or tool.

Entity-answer.label: answers
Entity-answer.description: The answers refer to the responses or solutions that users need, which are identified by FERRET's predictive questioning approach.

Entity-predictive_questioning.label: predictive questioning
Entity-predictive_questioning.description: A novel approach to question-answering that attempts to identify users' questions and answers by analyzing their interactions with a system while gathering information related to a particular scenario.

Entity-question.label: questions
Entity-question.description: A type of inquiry or query, typically asked in order to gather information or clarify understanding.

summary: This paper describes FERRET , an interactive question-answering -LRB- Q/A -RRB- system designed to address the challenges of integrating automatic Q/A applications into real-world environments . FERRET utilizes a novel approach to Q/A known as predictive questioning which attempts to identify the questions -LRB- and answers -RRB- that users need by analyzing how a user interacts with a system while gathering information related to a particular scenario .

Predicate-describes.label: describes
Predicate-describes.description: The predicate 'describes' connects a subject (typically an entity or concept) to its representation or characteristics, highlighting what it represents or conveys about something.

skos:broader.label: utilizes
skos:broader.description: The predicate 'utilizes' indicates that the subject has a specific way of using or making use of something (the object), often implying efficiency, effectiveness, or cleverness in doing so.
